item.title: The Witches
item.description: Recently I read The Witches, an insteresting story. The story is about a boy whose parents died in an accident, and he stayed with his grandmother. While they were on vacation, the boy was turned into a mouse by the witches using a potion called Mouse-Maker. Then he and his grandmother made a plan to put Mouse-Maker into the witches’ dinner. Then they succeeded and wanted to get rid of all the witches in the world.

item.title: Tom the Kitten Goes Fishing
item.description: One day, Tom, a cat, wanted to go fishing. Taking up a fishing pole and a bucket, Tom walked to the river. On the way, a butterfly flew past Tom. He said, “It was so beautiful; I wanted to catch it.” Tom ran after the butterfly. But the butterfly was too swift, so Tom gave up. He said tiredly, “If I should see the butterfly next time, I would definitely catch it.” Maybe Tom’s wish would never be fulfilled, because there were many butterflies that he couldn’t distinguish that one among them. Then, he continued on his way.
